DOC.brief_summary: Study Vietnamese Patients Coronary Heart Disease investigate safety P2Y12 Receptor Inhibition Effects Ticagrelor Clopidogrel
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Study Safety P2Y12 Receptor Inhibition Effects Ticagrelor Clopidogrel Vietnamese Patient
DOC.detailed_description: Safety P2Y12 Receptor Inhibition Effects Ticagrelor Clopidogrel Vietnamese Patients Coronary Heart Disease : A Randomized , Open Label , Crossover Study
DOC.criteria: Male female Vietnamese patient ( confirm Principal Investigator ) age > 18 year suitable vein cannulation repeat venipuncture stable coronary heart disease Stable use aspirin 75 100 mg daily least precede 2 week continue throughout study period Have body mass index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 inclusive Women must negative urine pregnancy test Visit 1 History clinically significant disease disorder , opinion investigator , may either put patient risk participation study , influence result patient 's ability participate study Unstable angina clinically significant illness , medical/surgical procedure trauma within 4 week first administration IP Patients acute coronary syndrome stent place within 12 month screen Planned arterial revascularization Current use ADP receptor blocker ( eg , clopidogrel , ticlopidine , prasugrel ) , dipyridamole cilostazol
